DOC.brief_summary: To study the correlation between the polymorphism of the main immunity genes and progression-free survival in ALCL of the child.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Biological Mechanisms Associated With the Immunogenicity in Anaplastic Large Cell Lymphoma ( ALCL ) ALK +
DOC.criteria: Every patients treated according to COPADIGR, HM 89,91 and 97 and ALCL99 protocols and included in related studies Clinical data registered in SFCE database Signed consent form No ALK expression on tumour No consent signed
